thread.title: Kim Kardashian and Blac Chyna Update Us on Their Weight-Loss Journeys
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian and Blac Chyna Update Us on Their Weight-Loss Journeys

author: Celebuzz
title: Kim Kardashian and Blac Chyna Update Us on Their Weight-Loss Journeys
text:
36 Photos » 
Meanwhile, Blac Chyna announced on Snapchat that she’s lost 40 pounds since giving birth to Dream Kardashian on Nov. 10, 2016, and still wants to lose 24 more to reach her goal weight of 130 pounds by the summer. The new mom recently told E! News that she’s slowing down her pregnancy cravings using her own methods. 
“It’s super hard,” Chyna said. “I had actually had a C-section, so with breastfeeding and drinking water and my teas and my other little remedies…it’s been working out for me really good.” 
Feb 21, 2017 at 5:30pm PST 

Launch the gallery at the top of the page to click through Blac Chyna’s nipple-baring photoshoot. Advertisement
